creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: dark blue, light blue and off-white; six narrow panels sewn along long edges; small folded and sewn hem along short edges; dark blue bands along short edges; lighter blue stripes down length; along lighter blue stripes, off-white design of alternating stripes and square dots in rows down length; off-white stripes have diagonal blue striping
title: Wrapper
